name: Crooked Casino: Cheaters Never Learn
description:
The government has introduce a new 'fair play' law to casinos.

Many have shut down due as a result, cheaters have nowhere else to go.

You are a stubborn casino owner, stop the cheaters and make the most money you can in the week before the inspector shuts you down.

Controls

  • Mouse 1 only, find the cheater

Gameplay

Spot the cheaters, should be easy enough, right?

Theme: Within the AI are dirty scoundrels out there to rob you blind, others will simply learn how to beat the casino. To win? The player aim isn't simply to catch the cheaters but to get the most score, and to use all means to survive . The simple controls are to emphasize you being powerless to control the chaos.
